home.title: Abdelilah BOUROUDA
home.subtitle: I build, secure, and manage digital infrastructure across physical and virtual environments.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: Passionate digital infrastructure specialist with expertise in building, securing, and managing complex IT environments. I specialize in virtualization, networking, and system administration across Windows and Linux platforms. My experience spans from traditional on-premises infrastructure to modern cloud solutions, always focusing on security, reliability, and performance optimization.
about.vision: My vision is to bridge the gap between traditional infrastructure and modern cloud technologies, creating robust, scalable, and secure digital environments that enable businesses to thrive in the digital age.

hybridLab.title: Hybrid Network Lab
hybridLab.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive hybrid network laboratory combining physical and virtual infrastructure. Features multiple VLANs, inter-VLAN routing, and secure remote access through VPN.

proxmoxCluster.title: Proxmox Cluster Setup
proxmoxCluster.description: Built a high-availability Proxmox cluster with shared storage, live migration capabilities, and automated backup solutions. Implemented monitoring and alerting for proactive maintenance.

monitoringDashboard.title: Infrastructure Monitoring Dashboard
monitoringDashboard.description: Developed a comprehensive monitoring solution using Zabbix with custom dashboards, automated alerting, and performance analytics for critical infrastructure components.

securityAudit.title: Network Security Audit
securityAudit.description: Conducted thorough security assessment of enterprise network infrastructure, identifying vulnerabilities and implementing hardening measures to improve overall security posture.

ccnaIntro.name: CCNA: Introduction to Networks
ccnaIntro.description: Acquired foundational knowledge of computer networks, including OSI and TCP/IP models, IPv4 and IPv6 addressing, network topology design, and the use of network equipment like routers and switches.

ccnaSwitching.name: CCNA: Switching, Routing, and Wireless Essentials
ccnaSwitching.description: Gained in-depth understanding of switching technologies, static and dynamic routing, and wireless networks (Wi-Fi). Learned to configure VLANs, STP, DHCP, NAT, and secure network access.

ccnaEnterprise.name: CCNA: Enterprise Networking, Security, and Automation
ccnaEnterprise.description: Developed advanced skills in network security (ACL, VPN, device security), enterprise network administration, and network automation via Python and REST APIs.

ethicalHacker.name: Ethical Hacker
ethicalHacker.description: Introduced to penetration testing techniques, vulnerability analysis, target system reconnaissance, network exploitation, and fundamental principles of offensive cybersecurity.

networkingBasics.name: Networking Basics
networkingBasics.description: Gained a general understanding of networks: network protocols, devices, IP addresses, DNS, switches, routers, and data transmission. An excellent introduction before the CCNA program.

pythonEssentials.name: Python Essentials 1
pythonEssentials.description: Learned the basics of Python programming: variables, conditionals, loops, functions, data structures (lists, dictionaries), and algorithmic concepts. This foundation allows me to automate IT tasks.

computerHardware.name: Computer Hardware Basics
computerHardware.description: Training on internal computer components: motherboard, processor, RAM, hard drive, power supply, and peripherals. Also covered assembly, maintenance, and hardware troubleshooting.

cybersecurityIntro.name: Introduction to Cybersecurity
cybersecurityIntro.description: Discovered current threats to computer systems, cybersecurity principles, security policies, password best practices, and the challenges for businesses and individuals.

aiIntro.name: Introduction to Modern AI
aiIntro.description: This certification introduced me to key AI concepts: machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, AI ethics, and modern uses of artificial intelligence in businesses.
